amanda.description: Amanda Joyce has become an accomplished photographer; and a visit at their house means one more photo shoot session for the Moses brothers. Expect a retrospective sometimes soon.
amanda.title: Amanda

fall.description: The leaves are changing color, the days are getting shorter, the air is getting colder... this can only mean one thing: Halloween is approaching! Felix is eagerly waiting for it.  However, he does not quite understand that Halloween is a day, not a place. He keeps saying "want visit Halloween! want be a cosmonaut! want be in a rocket ship!". We need to make it clearer to him that his astronaut costume does NOT come with an operating space ship. We fear disappointment.
fall.title: Fall

kindergym.description: Felix loves the YMCA's kindergym. He gets to go there every Monday, with school. Sometimes, he also goes there with Lucie and Milo.
kindergym.title: Kindergym

lego_train.description: A lot of time is spent playing lego in our family, hence the more and more complex lego creations.
lego_train.title: Lego Train

library4.description: Nana came for the week-end. We took a trip to our local library to borrow books; then we went to our local coffee shop to read our bounty. Simple pleasures.
library4.title: Library 4

nana1.description: Nana and Milo spent time getting better acquainted. She managed to feed him 2 bottles, not a small feat, considering how discriminate Milo is about milk delivery.
nana1.title: Nana 1

nana2.description: A grand-mother is a wonderful place to nap.
nana2.title: Nana 2

napa.description: Dean, Lucie and Milo went to Napa for Scott and Traci's wedding among the vineyards. As per our habit, we took photos of ourselves, but not of the happy couple. Oups.
napa.title: Napa

smile1.description: Milo has a beautiful smile, and he loves to share it.
smile1.title: Smile 1

smile2.description:
Milo is quite the conversationalist.

He smiles, coos, and aaaa-euhs with conviction. He gets more and more animated when you reply with funny noises and facial expressions of your own. He really seems eager to communicate.
smile2.title: Smile 2

smile3.description:
Milo often tries to imitate us, with various degrees of success.

Here, Lucie tries to get him to stick out his tounge. He did manage to do it a bit, but we weren't quick enough to catch it on camera. You'll have to trust us.
smile3.title: Smile 3

smile4.description: Another favorite: having his foot eaten.
smile4.title: Smile 4

stare1.description: Milo isn't playing with toys yet, but he is beginning to stare at them with interest.
stare1.title: Stare 1

stare2.description: Milo stares at everything and everyone. His favorite thing to look at are faces. He thrives on eye contact.
stare2.title: Stare 2

work1.description: Cuddling a baby on your lap doesn't mean you can't check email.
work1.title: Work 1

description:
At his 2 month checkup, Milo weighed 12lbs 11oz (5.750 kilos) and measured 24.5 inches (62 centimeters). That puts him in the 90th percentile height-wise, and 70th percentile weight-wise.

Milo is smiling and cooing more and more. We are all enjoying it. As Felix puts it, "Baby smiles at me! Baby likes me!" Sometimes when Milo's crying, the best way to soothe him is to actually put him down and just smile and coo at him. Often he will start smiling and cooing back.

Talking with Felix can be just about the most fun thing ever. Recent bedtime conversation:

    Dean: (singing) Home, home on the range...
    Felix: What's a range?
    Dean: It's kind of like a really big farm.
    Felix: Has cows?
    Dean: Has buffalo cows. (singing) Where the buffalo roam...
    Felix: Has monkeys?
    Dean: No, it's a farm, not a zoo. (singing) And the skies...
    Felix: Has chickens?
    Dean: Yes! Can I sing now?
title: October 4
